channel.title: biodata-club on Ted Laderas, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in biodata-club on Ted Laderas, PhD

item.title: Data Scavenger Hunt: NHANES
item.description: An introduction to Exploratory Data Analysis using the burro app to explore outcomes using the NHANES (National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey) dataset. With Jessica Minnier and Thomas Frohwein.

item.title: Introduction to Github Pages
item.description: A pain free introduction to getting a personal academic website started using GitHub pages. With Robin Champieux, Eric Earl, and Eric Leung.

item.title: The Magic of Markdown
item.description: An introduction to the many uses of Markdown, including RMarkdown for reproducible scripting.
